features.mobileControlDesc: Smartphone app enables path planning and operation
features.wideCompatibilityDesc: Works with multiple agricultural machinery brands/models
features.offlineOperationDesc: Functions without network via mobile base station

productsPage.title: Our Product Range
productsPage.description: Discover our comprehensive range of agricultural drones and autonomous ground robots designed for precision farming.

aboutUs.title: Revolutionizing Polish Agriculture
aboutUs.subtitle: XAG IMEGA Poland is the authorized distributor of XAG agricultural drones in Poland, dedicated to transforming farming through innovative technology.

story.title: Pioneers of Smart Agriculture in Poland
story.p1: XAG IMEGA Poland introduces drones, robots, autopilots, artificial intelligence, and IoT solutions to agricultural production, creating an intelligent farming ecosystem characteristic of Agriculture 4.0.
story.p2: Our mission is to make agriculture smarter by combining leading drone technology with IoT field monitoring stations, GNSS RTK geospatial intelligence, and cloud computing.
story.p3: We strive to address aging rural populations, protect natural resources and biodiversity, and improve productivity while ensuring food security.

mission.title: Produce More with Less
mission.description: According to UN Agenda 2030, 821 million people globally suffer from hunger. With global population expected to reach 9 billion by 2050, agricultural production must increase approximately 60% to meet demand. We are committed to helping farmers produce more food using fewer resources.

items.foodSecurityDesc: Supporting long-term food security and environmental stewardship
items.monitoringDesc: Remote monitoring of crops and production processes through continuous IoT field monitoring stations
items.xaiPlatformDesc: Data-exchange platform connecting intelligent XAG devices and integrating agricultural production with smart technologies

values.title: What Drives Us
values.innovationDesc: We constantly push the boundaries of agricultural technology to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
values.sustainabilityDesc: Our precision agriculture solutions help reduce chemical usage and environmental impact.
values.excellenceDesc: We are committed to delivering the highest quality products and services to our customers.
values.partnershipDesc: We work closely with farmers to understand their needs and provide tailored solutions.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Farm?
cta.description: Contact our team to learn how XAG drones can help optimize your agricultural operations.

general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.operator: The online store www.imegagroup.pl is operated by IMEGA Sp. z o.o. based in Rybnik, ul. Smolna 14, 44-200 Rybnik, NIP: PL6423233602, e-mail: biuro@imegagroup.pl.
general.scope: The scope of business is the sale of professional agricultural platforms, including XAG drones and ground robots.
general.customer: A customer may be an adult - natural person, legal entity, or organizational unit with legal capacity.
general.consumer: A consumer is a natural person making a purchase unrelated to professional activity.

technical.title: 2. Technical Requirements
technical.requirements: Internet access and a browser supporting JavaScript (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) are required to use the store. Minimum screen resolution: 1024×768 pixels.
technical.prohibited: Users may not use the site unlawfully, violating personal rights of others, disrupting site functionality, or distributing unlawful content.

orders.title: 3. Placing Orders
orders.availability: Orders can be placed at any time through the website.
orders.process: Order process: (1) select products and quantities; (2) choose delivery and payment methods; (3) review order summary; (4) confirm order.
orders.confirmation: Upon receiving the order, the seller confirms order details electronically and checks product availability.
orders.agreement: A sales agreement is concluded between the customer and seller upon sending payment confirmation.
orders.language: Sales agreements are concluded in Polish.

payments.title: 4. Payments
payments.methods: Accepted payment methods: bank transfer, online payment, payment on delivery.

delivery.title: 5. Delivery
delivery.options: We deliver goods throughout Poland and the European Union via courier companies.
delivery.time: Delivery time depends on product availability and is usually 2-7 business days.

withdrawal.title: 6. Right of Withdrawal
withdrawal.period: Consumers have the right to withdraw from distance contracts within 14 days without giving any reason.
withdrawal.deadline: Submitting a written withdrawal statement before the deadline is sufficient to meet the deadline.
withdrawal.start: The withdrawal period begins from the day the customer receives the goods.

complaints.title: 7. Complaints
complaints.liability: The seller is obliged to deliver goods free from defects.
complaints.warranty: The seller is liable for physical and legal defects of goods in accordance with the Civil Code.
complaints.filing: Complaints may be filed in any form understandable to the seller. Defects and customer demands must be specified.
complaints.period: The customer should report the defect within one year of discovery (if discovered within two years of delivery).
complaints.resolution: The seller resolves complaints within 14 days of receipt.

guarantee.title: 8. Quality Guarantee
guarantee.period: The seller guarantees product functionality for one year from receipt, unless otherwise specified in the product description.
guarantee.scope: The guarantee covers manufacturing defects only and operates within Poland and EU territory.
guarantee.exclusions: The guarantee does not cover improper installation, misuse, neglect, or normal wear.
guarantee.remedies: Remedy options include: repair, replacement (if repair impossible), or price reduction/refund (if replacement impossible).

dataProtection.title: 9. Personal Data Protection
dataProtection.handling: The operator processes customer data in accordance with Polish Personal Data Protection Act and Electronic Services Law.
dataProtection.policy: Detailed rules on personal data and cookie processing are set out in the Privacy Policy.

final.title: 10. Final Provisions
final.disputes: Disputes between the operator and consumers are resolved in accordance with applicable law.
final.alternative: Consumers may access extrajudicial complaint procedures via: http://www.uokik.gov.pl, http://www.rzu.gov.pl, or regional consumer protection offices.
final.business: Non-consumer disputes are resolved before courts competent for the seller's registered office.
final.law: Polish law applies to matters not regulated herein.
final.compliance: These terms do not limit customer rights under applicable law.

administrator.title: Data Administrator
administrator.content: The administrator of your personal data is IMEGA Sp. z o.o. based in Rybnik, ul. Smolna 14, 44-200 Rybnik, NIP: 6423233602.

dataCollection.title: 1. Data We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We may collect the following personal data:

items.personal: Name, address, email address, phone number
items.technical: IP address, browser type, device information
items.usage: Pages visited and time spent on site

purpose.title: 2. Purpose of Data Processing
purpose.intro: We process your data for the following purposes:

retention.title: 3. Data Retention Period
retention.content: Data is maintained throughout the contractual relationship and legal obligation period, or until consent withdrawal or formal objection.

profiling.title: 4. Profiling
profiling.content: The site uses automatic content personalization based on user behavior to recommend relevant products. This doesn't produce legally binding effects.

recipients.title: 5. Data Recipients
recipients.intro: Your data may be shared with the following entities:
recipients.transfer: No transfers occur outside the European Economic Area.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

items.complaint: Right to file complaints with supervisory authorities

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.intro: We use cookies for the following purposes:
cookies.disable: You can disable cookies in your browser settings, though this may limit site functionality.

security.title: 8. Data Security
security.content: Data protection implements SSL encryption, secure databases with technical safeguards, and restricted access controls compliant with GDPR requirements.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.intro: For matters related to personal data protection, please contact:

warrantyService.title: Request Warranty Service
warrantyService.description: Submit a warranty claim for your XAG product. Our team will review your request and respond within 48 hours.
warrantyService.infoDescription: XAG products come with a standard 12-month warranty from the date of purchase. Extended warranty options are available through XAG Care Express. Please have your proof of purchase ready when submitting a warranty claim.
warrantyService.issueLabel: Please describe the defect or issue
warrantyService.issuePlaceholder: Describe the defect, when it occurred, and any relevant details...
warrantyService.noteText: Please have your proof of purchase (receipt or invoice) available. We may request additional documentation to process your warranty claim.
warrantyService.successMessage: Thank you for your warranty claim. Our team will review and respond within 48 hours.

repairService.title: Request Repair Service
repairService.description: Submit a repair request and our technical team will get back to you within 24 hours.
repairService.issuePlaceholder: Describe the problem you're experiencing, when it started, and any error messages...
repairService.successMessage: Thank you for your repair request. Our team will contact you within 24 hours.
